forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 60. West wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 77. Northwest wind 6 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As the quiet hours of the night embrace Boston, the air feels refreshing, with a gentle sigh of wind whispering through the trees. Tonight, clarity reigns, heralding a low temperature around sixty, perfect for a light sweater or a cozy shawl. The stars, though slightly veiled, cast a distant glow, promising a serene night sky.

With dawn on the horizon, the day unfurls its canvas, revealing promises of sunshine and warmth. Expect it to rise into the comfortable embrace of seventy-seven degrees, inviting both fleeting warmth and gentle breezes from the northwest. The brightness of the day suggests an ideal time for modest exploration; a stroll along the Charles River, a visit to a favorite café to savor a well-crafted brew, or simply finding a quiet bench to read a book while basking in the sun’s caress could be just the ticket. Comfortable, breathable clothing, perhaps a light button-down or a cool sundress, will serve well throughout this splendid day. In this moment, Boston offers an easy blend of casual ease and charming opportunities, beckoning one to enjoy its gentle rhythms.
